viewData.name: PhiLashes Mirror
viewData.short_description: PhiLashes Mirror is a must have tool during eyelash extension process.┬áProvides an absolute view from every angle, helping you to achieve a flawless application.
viewData.long_description: Use it to check your work progress during the treatment, as it provides fast and effective application with minimal effort, by giving you the possibility to skip moving around the client to check the look of their eyelashes from the underside.┬á
